title: Ricky Gervais | Senate GOP Blocks Election Bill, Manchin and Sinema Vote to Keep Filibuster: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Senators Joe Manchin and Kyrsten Sinema voting with Republicans in blocking changes to the filibuster that would have allowed voting rights legislation to pass with a simple majority.

Then, Ricky Gervais talks about his show After Life, the show's heavy subject matter and his writing process. He also shares an update on his health, comments on the Hollywood Foreign Press’ Golden Globes Awards and talks about his return to stand-up.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
